unnormalised: Flash sales, right? Like Chandni Chowk on Diwali – crazy! Saw a kurta I wanted, vanished in seconds. Think I need a JioFiber connection just for these things. My friend Priya says it's all Maya Jaal, like in that movie... Don, I think? Or was it a Karan Johar film? Anyway, feels like trying to get into IIM Ahmedabad – super competitive. Worth it for a good discount, though. Rs. 500 off is Rs. 500!
